Title: EU faces up to 46.6 bn m3 of gas supply gap in November-March
Description: The European Union faces a gas supply gap of up to 46.6 bn m3 for the rest of the winter (November-March) if Russian pipeline supplies stopped via all routes in November-March. Continued abundant LNG imports, combined with demand destruction and gas held in underground storage, are crucial to fill this gap
Author: DE

Title: Kpler Insight forecasts around 10 mt more LNG will emerge this winter versus a year earlier
Description: Global LNG supply will increase by around 10 mt over the October to March winter season compared to a year earlier, with higher output mainly from the US and Norway, according to a forecast by Kpler Insight.
Author: CK
